title: Fugitive Detection System for Crowd Safety
content: • A Python-based Machine Learning application used to detect fugitives from live CCTV streams using Image Processing and Facial Recognition • POC for the application was requested by the Commissioner of Police, Pune

title: VR Experience for Andaman & Nicobar Islands Heritage Sites (Smart India Hackathon)
content: • A Smartphone-based VR application to give the experience of the heritage sites and museums of the Andaman and Nicobar Islands with complete 3D Modelling using SketchUp, Unity 3D, and sound design in FL Studio • Developed at the Smart India Hackathon 2019 • Among the top 10 projects at the college level with more than 150 submissions

title: Pipeline Based Framework for Pair Trading
content: • IEEE Paper for the design of a specialized framework used for analyzing Pair Trading technique • Presented at Inventive Research in Computing Applications (ICIRCA) and Published in IEEE Digital Library

title: LeadHeart Musician Website
content: • A website created in Angular that uses the Spotify API to fetch the top tracks from my Spotify Artist Profile • This is a personal website I created in order to promote my music • Written using Angular, SCSS, Spotify API and deployed on Vercel • GitHub Repo — https://github.com/paritoshpatil/leadheart

title: Automated Attendance System using Facial Recognition
content: • Deep learning-based Facial Recognition system for marking student attendance automatically, written using Python, OpenCV, and Face_Recognition Library

title: Obstacle Avoiding Robot
content: • A low-level autonomous robot that detects obstacles and avoids them built using Arduino UNO

title: To-Do
content: • A minimalistic to-do app created using React, TailwindCSS, and Firebase • Created in order to practice React hooks, rapid CSS styling using Tailwind, and NoSQL Database manipulation using Firebase • Implemented CRUD using Firebase Firestore • Hosted on Firebase • GitHub Repo — https://github.com/paritoshpatil/todo-firebase

title: PowerHouse
content: • A static website created in HTML and Bootstrap 4 created to practice basic CSS styling • GitHub Repo — https://github.com/paritoshpatil/PowerHouse

title: Dev Portfolio / Resume Website
content: • This website that you're currently viewing, built in React using TailwindCSS and Framer Motion for animations • Data is consumed from JSON files • All the UI components are designed completely from scratch
